thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 6 of 287
thread.title: M Attebery
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by M Attebery

author: M Attebery
title: M Attebery
text: Everyone I worked with was wonderful! Jeff Kawasaki was amazing! He kept me well informed and answered all my questions. I expected to be passed off to different people for different parts of the loan process, but Jeff kept in contact the whole time and made sure I was comfortable and knew what was going on. So happy with my decision to work with quicken!
